Name: Enriching Botanic Growth Powder
Description: A culinary byproduct primarily used for crafting fish bait.
Description2$english: Made by simmering robust plant stems and stress-resistant buds, then sun-drying and grinding them into a fine powder—highly attractive to fish and perfect for bait-making!

recipes.Name: Enriching Botanic Growth Powder
recipes.Des: Made by simmering robust plant stems and stress-resistant buds, then sun-drying and grinding them into a fine powder—highly attractive to fish and perfect for bait-making!

NeedMaterial.Name: Robust Plant Stems
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.

NeedMaterial.Name: Stress-Resistant Buds
NeedMaterial.Description: Collected resource that can be processed further with Life Skills.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: In their free-living state, buds exhibit no discernible metabolic activity and exist in a dormant phase characterized as cryptobiosis. Upon encountering favorable environmental conditions, they resume activity and germinate into vegetative cells.
